resources.string: After selecting a single contact, you will be shown a preview of the generated image. You can then choose to apply the image or generate a different variation.

Different flavours of Android might handle phonebook entries and contact pictures differently to what this app is prepared for. Therefore we recommend making a backup of your contacts, before overwriting images.

If this app is not localised in a language that you speak or if you feel like you can improve this translation, please contact the developer. This app is a one-man project and requires support by the community.
Saved the image on the device. \nLocation: %1$s
Which app would you like to open the generated image with?
An error occurred. Please check the app\'s permissions.
